CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_new
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11000}{CAPTIVE_NAME} is brought through by the ladies of your harem.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11001}Have the ladies of the harem welcome her.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_wife
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11002}{CAPTIVE_NAME} is brought through by the ladies of your harem.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11003}Have the ladies of the harem welcome h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er{?}im{\?}.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_test
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11004}Your Procuress at the harem hurriedly comes to you with whispered news about {CAPTIVE_NAME}: while being prepared for you, she confessed that she has never shared her bed with any man! "I knew to bring this to you at once, Efendi."

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11005}This changes nothing. Have her brought immediately.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11006}On second thought, this calls for a new strategy...

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_menu
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11007}{CAPTIVE_NAME} is presented to you by the ladies of your harem.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11011}Have a chat with the Procuress about {CAPTIVE_NAME}.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_procuress
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11013}You are chatting with your Procuress of Whores. "Your wish is our command, Most Omnimpotent {?PLAYER.GENDER}Mistress{?}Master{\?}."

Option.OptionText: {DefaultCaptorRequiredEventsFemale10}Secure a iron collar around her neck, she will remain to serve as your slave.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11045}You have no romantic interest in {CAPTIVE_NAME}. Have h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er{?}im{\?} assigned to a cell far from you.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11021}Have the Procuress acquire a fresh girl for you.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11022}Have the Procuress acquire a large group of girls at the slave market.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_prefs
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_1100x}"How may we please you today, Great One?"

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_1100x}Tell the Procuress you are in the market for a fresh girl.
{=BCCaptor_Text_1100x}Tell the Procuress you are no longer looking for fresh girls.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_procuress_m
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11024}You are chatting with your Procuress of Male Whores. "Your wish is our command, Most Omnimpotent {?PLAYER.GENDER}Mistress{?}Master{\?}."

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11045}You have no romantic interest in {CAPTIVE_NAME}. Have h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er{?}im{\?} assigned to a cell far from you.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_prefs_m
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11027}"How may we please you today, Great One?"

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11028}Tell the Procuress to acquire a fresh boy for you.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11030}A slave trader approaches...

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_random
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11029}A slave trader approaches with a deal on a virgin. A shy young beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_aserai
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11051}A shy young Aserai beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_battania
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11052}A shy young Battanian beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_empire
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11053}A shy young Empire beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_khuzait
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11054}A shy young Khuzait beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_sturgia
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11055}A shy young Sturgian beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_vlandia
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11056}A shy young Vlandian beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_bundle
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11057}Your dealer, a man with an eye and appetites which you must admit far surpass your own in their depths of cruelty, promises your money back if you are dissatisfied with a single one of the girls he has handpicked for you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_boy_random
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_1100x}A slave trader approaches with a deal on a young man. A shy, handsome boy is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11032}Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_new
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11037}Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, sniffing the very air as she passes...

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11038}Make sure {CAPTIVE_NAME} gets a good view of army life.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_wife
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11039}Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, whooping and making lewd gestures...

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11040}Make sure {CAPTIVE_NAME} gets a good view of your most intimidating men.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_menu
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11039}Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, whooping and making lewd gestures...

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11042}Warn her that if she displeases you, you will throw her to the men.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11043}Leave her perfumed and silked flesh with the men, as a treat.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11044}Show her the tortures which await the disobedient.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_menu_m
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11039}Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, whooping and making lewd gestures...

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11046}Warn him that if he displeases you, you will leave him with the men as a treat.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11047}Whip him in front of the troops.
{=BCCaptor_Text_11048}Send him to the torturers in shackles.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_debug
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_10667}DEBUG {CAPTIVE_NAME} - UNFAIR, UNBALANCED

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_10668}Full Amnesia, hard reset of all BC skills.
